title: Freedom List (Denmark)
text:
The Freedom List () is a Danish political group. The group is <a href="Liberalism">liberal</a>, with a desire for the individual's rights to their own body, and the right to refuse <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic">COVID-19</a> regulations such as face masks and vaccines. The group is on the ballot in 26 municipalities and all 5 regions of Denmark in the <a href="2021%20Danish%20local%20elections">2021 Danish local elections</a>.
Background.
The group was founded by Flemming Blicher, who had previously been behind several <a href="COVID-19%20misinformation">COVID-19 denialist</a> demonstrations and demonstrations against the government's handling of the <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic%20in%20Denmark">COVID-19 pandemic in Denmark</a>.
The group describes itself as a collection of individuals, with localists and regionalist focuses, allowing the members of the group to express their own opinions regardless of what the rest of the group might think. The focus for several of the group's members are to fight the government's regulations regarding the COVID-19 pandemic in Denmark.
